column5: i have a 82 lb thrust motorguide and the I needed a new steering cable for it..so i ordered the part and it looks impossible to put in ...I have no clue where to start, and even if I get it on, how do I adjust the tension..?  Does anybody know a good cheap place that will be able to handle my problem for me?  thanks  ps im located in etobicoke
Look up Aikman's in Mississauga   (905) 277-3595  They're on Novar rd.
